raw.description: Include raw response. Mostly used for debugging purposes

x-apideck-consumer-id.description: ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from

x-apideck-app-id.description: The ID of your Unify application

x-apideck-service-id.description: Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

code.description: Tax code assigned to identify this tax rate.
code.title: Tax code

id.description: ID assigned to identify this tax rate.

name.description: Name assigned to identify this tax rate.
name.title: Name

original_tax_rate_id.description: ID of the original tax rate from which the new tax rate is derived. Helps to understand the relationship between corresponding tax rate entities.
original_tax_rate_id.title: Original tax rate ID

report_tax_type.description: Report Tax type to aggregate tax collected or paid for reporting purposes
report_tax_type.title: Report Tax Type

tax_payable_account_id.description: Unique identifier for the account for tax collected.
tax_payable_account_id.title: Tax payable account id

tax_remitted_account_id.description: Unique identifier for the account for tax remitted.
tax_remitted_account_id.title: Tax remitted account id

total_tax_rate.description: Not compounded sum of the components of a tax rate
total_tax_rate.title: Total tax rate

type.description: Tax type used to indicate the source of tax collected or paid
type.title: Tax Type

CreatedAt.description: The date and time when the object was created.
CreatedAt.title: Created at (timestamp)

CreatedBy.description: The user who created the object.
CreatedBy.title: Created by

CustomMappings.description: When custom mappings are configured on the resource, the result is included here.

RowVersion.description: A binary value used to detect updates to a object and prevent data conflicts. It is incremented each time an update is made to the object.
RowVersion.title: Row version

UpdatedAt.description: The date and time when the object was last updated.
UpdatedAt.title: Updated at (timestamp)

UpdatedBy.description: The user who last updated the object.
UpdatedBy.title: Updated by

$ul: **data**
**id**: The unique identifier of the resource
**operation**: Operation performed
**resource**: Unified API resource name
**service**: Apideck ID of service provider
